subject: Re: Fixed exclude_dir in the recycle vfs
body:
On Tue, Apr 10, 2007 at 08:53:55AM +1000, Jon Gough wrote:
> Jeremy,
>    I downloaded the samba_3_0_23 version and applied your change to 
> that (it has VFS interface 16 which matches my 2.0.24-3 rpm) and 
> tried it out. It works well.

Great - thanks very much for testing this, I really appreciate
it !

Jeremy.
